column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bavette's truly raises the bar when it comes to quality of service
column2: food and atmosphere. A couple shout outs. one to Brandon
column4: for setting a warm and welcoming tone at first impression. Second to Benjamin
column8: fun and full of food / drink knowledge. Third to the bus staff for reminding my guest and I to "sit back
column9: enjoy and let us do all the work" (talk about adding an extra step of service
column11: the phenomenal back of house for offering us some of the best damn food in the city. THANK YOU for the superb experience!
